verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David בְּֽבוֹא־ <S%H935><s%> came אֵ֭לָיו <S%H413><s%> when נָתָ֣ן <S%H5416><s%> when Nathan הַנָּבִ֑יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet כַּֽאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> he בָּ֝֗א <S%H935><s%> unto him after he had gone in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בַּת־ שָֽׁבַע׃ <S%H1339><s%> to Bathsheba חָנֵּ֣נִי <S%H2603><s%> Have mercy אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> upon me O God כְּחַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H2617><s%> according to thy lovingkindness כְּרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> according unto the multitude רַ֝חֲמֶ֗יךָ <S%H7356><s%> of thy tender mercies מְחֵ֣ה <S%H4229><s%> blot out פְשָׁעָֽי׃ <S%H6588><s%> my transgressions

[הַרְבֵּה כ] (הֶ֭רֶב <S%H7235><s%> abundance ק) כַּבְּסֵ֣נִי <S%H3526><s%> Wash מֵעֲוֹנִ֑י <S%H5771><s%> from mine iniquity וּֽמֵחַטָּאתִ֥י <S%H2403><s%> me from my sin טַהֲרֵֽנִי׃ <S%H2891><s%> and cleanse

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for פְ֭שָׁעַי <S%H6588><s%> my transgressions אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I אֵדָ֑ע <S%H3045><s%> For I acknowledge וְחַטָּאתִ֖י <S%H2403><s%> and my sin נֶגְדִּ֣י <S%H5048><s%> before תָמִֽיד׃ <S%H8548><s%> [is] ever

לְךָ֤ לְבַדְּךָ֨ ׀ <S%H905><s%> only חָטָאתִי֮ <S%H2398><s%> Against thee thee only have I sinned וְהָרַ֥ע <S%H7451><s%> [this] evil בְּעֵינֶ֗יךָ <S%H5869><s%> in thy sight עָ֫שִׂ֥יתִי <S%H6213><s%> and done לְ֭מַעַן <S%H4616><s%> So תִּצְדַּ֥ק <S%H6663><s%> that thou mightest be justified בְּדָבְרֶ֗ךָ <S%H1696><s%> when thou speakest תִּזְכֶּ֥ה <S%H2135><s%> [and] be clear בְשָׁפְטֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8199><s%> when thou judgest

הֵן־ <S%H2005><s%> Behold בְּעָו֥וֹן <S%H5771><s%> in iniquity חוֹלָ֑לְתִּי <S%H2342><s%> Behold I was shapen וּ֝בְחֵ֗טְא <S%H2399><s%> and in sin יֶֽחֱמַ֥תְנִי <S%H3179><s%> conceive אִמִּֽי׃ <S%H517><s%> did my mother

הֵן־ <S%H2005><s%> Behold אֱ֭מֶת <S%H571><s%> truth חָפַ֣צְתָּ <S%H2654><s%> Behold thou desirest בַטֻּח֑וֹת <S%H2910><s%> in the inward parts וּ֝בְסָתֻ֗ם <S%H5640><s%> and in the hidden חָכְמָ֥ה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom תוֹדִיעֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3045><s%> [part] thou shalt make me to know

תְּחַטְּאֵ֣נִי <S%H2398><s%> Purge בְאֵז֣וֹב <S%H231><s%> me with hyssop וְאֶטְהָ֑ר <S%H2891><s%> and I shall be clean תְּ֝כַבְּסֵ֗נִי <S%H3526><s%> wash וּמִשֶּׁ֥לֶג <S%H7950><s%> than snow אַלְבִּֽין׃ <S%H3835><s%> me and I shall be whiter

תַּ֭שְׁמִיעֵנִי <S%H8085><s%> Make me to hear שָׂשׂ֣וֹן <S%H8342><s%> joy וְשִׂמְחָ֑ה <S%H8057><s%> and gladness תָּ֝גֵ֗לְנָה <S%H1523><s%> may rejoice עֲצָמ֥וֹת <S%H6106><s%> [that] the bones דִּכִּֽיתָ׃ <S%H1794><s%> [which] thou hast broken

הַסְתֵּ֣ר <S%H5641><s%> Hide פָּ֭נֶיךָ <S%H6440><s%> thy face מֵחֲטָאָ֑י <S%H2399><s%> from my sins וְֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲוֹ֖נֹתַ֣י <S%H5771><s%> all mine iniquities מְחֵֽה׃ <S%H4229><s%> and blot out

לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> heart טָ֭הוֹר <S%H2889><s%> in me a clean בְּרָא־ <S%H1254><s%> Create לִ֣י אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> O God וְר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> spirit נָ֝כ֗וֹן <S%H3559><s%> a right חַדֵּ֥שׁ <S%H2318><s%> and renew בְּקִרְבִּֽי׃ <S%H7130><s%> within

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּשְׁלִיכֵ֥נִי <S%H7993><s%> Cast me not away מִלְּפָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> from thy presence וְר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> spirit קָ֝דְשְׁךָ֗ <S%H6944><s%> not thy holy אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> and take מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

הָשִׁ֣יבָה <S%H7725><s%> Restore לִּ֭י שְׂשׂ֣וֹן <S%H8342><s%> unto me the joy יִשְׁעֶ֑ךָ <S%H3468><s%> of thy salvation וְר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> spirit נְדִיבָ֣ה <S%H5081><s%> me [with thy] free תִסְמְכֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5564><s%> and uphold

אֲלַמְּדָ֣ה <S%H3925><s%> [Then] will I teach פֹשְׁעִ֣ים <S%H6586><s%> transgressors דְּרָכֶ֑יךָ <S%H1870><s%> thy ways וְ֝חַטָּאִ֗ים <S%H2400><s%> and sinners אֵלֶ֥יךָ <S%H413><s%> about יָשֽׁוּבוּ׃ <S%H7725><s%> shall be converted

הַצִּ֘ילֵ֤נִי <S%H5337><s%> Deliver מִדָּמִ֨ים ׀ <S%H1818><s%> me from bloodguiltiness אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> O God אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> thou God תְּשׁוּעָתִ֑י <S%H8668><s%> of my salvation תְּרַנֵּ֥ן <S%H7442><s%> shall sing aloud לְ֝שׁוֹנִ֗י <S%H3956><s%> [and] my tongue צִדְקָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H6666><s%> of thy righteousness

אֲ֭דֹנָי <S%H136><s%> O Lord שְׂפָתַ֣י <S%H8193><s%> thou my lips תִּפְתָּ֑ח <S%H6605><s%> open וּ֝פִ֗י <S%H6310><s%> and my mouth יַגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> shall shew forth תְּהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8416><s%> thy praise

כִּ֤י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תַחְפֹּ֣ץ <S%H2654><s%> For thou desirest זֶ֣בַח <S%H2077><s%> not sacrifice וְאֶתֵּ֑נָה <S%H5414><s%> else would I give ע֝וֹלָ֗ה <S%H5930><s%> not in burnt offering לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> are not תִרְצֶֽה׃ <S%H7521><s%> [it] thou delightest

זִֽבְחֵ֣י <S%H2077><s%> The sacrifices אֱלֹהִים֮ <S%H430><s%> of God ר֪וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> spirit נִשְׁבָּ֫רָ֥ה <S%H7665><s%> [are] a broken לֵב־ <S%H3820><s%> heart נִשְׁבָּ֥ר <S%H7665><s%> a broken וְנִדְכֶּ֑ה <S%H1794><s%> and a contrite אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> O God לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> You will not תִבְזֶֽה׃ <S%H959><s%> thou wilt not despise

הֵיטִ֣יבָה <S%H3190><s%> Do good בִ֭רְצוֹנְךָ <S%H7522><s%> in thy good pleasure אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צִיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> unto Zion תִּ֝בְנֶ֗ה <S%H1129><s%> build חוֹמ֥וֹת <S%H2346><s%> thou the walls יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem

אָ֤ז <S%H227><s%> Then תַּחְפֹּ֣ץ <S%H2654><s%> Then shalt thou be pleased זִבְחֵי־ <S%H2077><s%> with the sacrifices צֶ֭דֶק <S%H6664><s%> of righteousness עוֹלָ֣ה <S%H5930><s%> with burnt offering וְכָלִ֑יל <S%H3632><s%> and whole אָ֤ז <S%H227><s%> Then יַעֲל֖וּ <S%H5927><s%> then shall they offer עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִזְבַּחֲךָ֣ <S%H4196><s%> upon thine altar פָרִֽים׃ <S%H6499><s%> bullocks
